name: SPACELORD (clonethirteen)
description:
I made this game as a tribute to the classic "Space Invaders." I had always envisioned the game in many different possible "art-styles." There are 6 different aesthetics to choose from and can be changed in between games. The game play does not match "Space Invaders" completely. I made changes to make it a fair bit different from the original. Enjoy and share your hi-score in the comments! (Hi-score currently only saves locally. An online leaderboard is currently a WIP.) 

CONTROLS - use A , D to move left or right. Spacebar to shoot.
